functions.author: The Coven of Souls
pages: §1The following pages give a brief explanation of the various talismans and the souls they require as well as what they consume.

§1(Agility Talisman)
------------

Effects:
Speed II

Soul Required: Cat
Eats: Cod

§1(Air Walk Talisman)
--------------

Effects:
Allows the witch to walk on the air.

Soul Required: Strider
Eats: Crimson Fungus

§1(Feather Talisman)
------------

Effects:
Slow Falling

Soul Required: Chicken
Eats: Wheat Seeds

§1(Heartblood Talisman)
------------

Effects:
Regeneration II

Soul Required: Villager
Eats: Bread

§1(Leaping Talisman)
------------

Effects:
Jump Boost II

Soul Required: Rabbit
Eats: Carrot

§1(Shellbreath Talisman)
------------

Effects:
Water Breathing
Resistance

Soul Required: Turtle
Eats: Seagrass

§1(Fyreblood Talisman)
------------

Effects:
Fire Resistance

Soul Required: Blaze
Eats: Coal

§1(Detox Talisman)
------------

Effects:
Poison Immunity

Soul Required: Cave Spider
Eats: Chicken

§1(Witherward Talisman)
------------

Effects:
Wither Immunity

Soul Required: Wither Skeleton
Eats: Bone

§1(Night Sight Talisman)
------------

Effects:
Night Vision

Soul Required: Bat
Eats: Blood Vial

§1(Ironblade Talisman)
------------

Effects:
Strength I

Soul Required: Iron Golem
Eats: Iron Nugget

§1Talismans generally work by being in certain slots. These slots §2are generally stated in the talisman's lore§1.

NB: Soul Fragments are collected by hitting the undead with an athame.
